other_tests.changes_over_time: Both parents were initially MH-negative but later showed MH-susceptible results; thus, confirming a familial transmission of MH susceptibility.

other_tests.findings: Histopathologic examination revealed the presence of central core disease.
Tachycardia of 140 beats/min 45 min after induction of anesthesia.
RYR1 gene revealed mutation Arg2435His (G7304 3A) in all MH-susceptible family members.
Confirmed true relationship between investigated generations.
